data.title: Notes Web App
data.description: This is a Web Application which runs into browser. We can add notes and delete them too. We can also create new notes. This is built using vanilla JS and uses local computer's memory to store notes.

data.title: FIFA Player Search
data.description: FIFA player search can be used to search FIFA 19 players. Following the search results will lead to details of the specific player.

data.title: Nearme Eating Hub
data.description: This layout is built using React JS for food & restaurant category of a imagined website named Nearme

data.title: Netflix Homepage Clone
data.description: Netflix Homepage Clone is built using React JS. It uses themoviedb API to fetch data and display results. The mini video trailers are linked to the Youtube API

data.title: Real Homes Real Estate Website
data.description: This is an imaginary website names Real Homes which displays rental and on sale properties of UAE. Rapid API is serving data for this project. This project is built using NextJS and it has fully functional filters available for searching properties.  It also uses popular React libraries such as Framer Motion

data.title: Tesla Homepage Copy
data.description: Tesla Homepage Clone is created using React JS and styling is done using styled components

data.title: Chat App Design
data.description: This is a Web Design layout created using Figma with an inspiration from designers' community

data.title: Coding Services
data.description: This is an imaginary Web Services provider website which is built using React JS and Bootstrap 5. This was my first pet project in React JS
